name: GoMacro Peanut Butter + Chocolate Chip Bar
description:
Enjoy balanced goodness and organic ingredients in the classic chocolate/peanut butter flavour combo.Organic ingredients:  brown rice syrup, peanut butter, protein blend (sprouted brown rice protein, pea protein) puffed brown rice, fair trade chocolate chips (coconut sugar, cocoa, cocoa butter), peanuts.Manufactured in a facility that processes peanuts and other nuts.May contain pit or nutshell fragments.

        Sustainability
